source_sentence: 我或今生、或於餘生，無始時來廣作眾罪，或自作、或隨喜作、或教他作；或偷盜佛物四方僧物，或自作、或隨喜作、或教他作；或造五無間罪、十不善業道，或自作、或隨喜作、或教他作。
translation: In this life or another life, I've committed numerous sins since beginningless time, either on my own, with pleasure, or by teaching others to do so; I've stolen property from buddhas and monks in four directions, either on my own, with pleasure, or by teaching others to do so; or I've committed the five unremitting sins and ten unwholesome courses of action, either on my own, with pleasure, or by teaching others to do so.

source_sentence: 由此業障，覆蔽身心，生於八難，或墮地獄、傍生、鬼趣，或生邊地及彌戾車，或生長壽天，設得人身諸根不具，或起邪見撥無因果，或厭諸佛出興于世。
translation: As a result of these karmic hindrances, they are hindered in body and mind and are born into eight difficult rebirths, or they may fall into hell, an unliving life, or a ghostly existence, or they may be born in a marginal land or a miserable chariot, or they may grow up in a long-lived heaven, or they may attain a human body whose faculties are not fully endowed, or they may develop wrong views and reject the lack of cause and effect, or they may become disillusioned with the appearance of the buddhas in the world.

source_sentence: 如是一切業障，我今對一切諸佛世尊，具一切智者、具五眼者、證實際者、稱量者、知者、見者前，我今誠心悉皆懺悔，不敢覆藏，願我尸羅律儀復得如故。
translation: As a result of all these karmic hindrances, I now sincerely repent before all the buddhas and world-honored ones who have omniscience, who have the five eyes, who have realized reality, who have measured, who know, and who have seen, and I dare not conceal them, hoping that my moral discipline will be restored as before.

source_sentence: 復願諸佛世尊攝受護念證明於我，若我今生或復餘生，無始時來於流轉生死，或曾捨施傍生一團之食、或曾持一淨戒、或曾修梵行善根、或曾修少分無上智善根，悉皆合集計校籌量。
translation: May the world-honored buddhas take me in and protect me, proving that if I were to ever give away a morsel of food to an unenlightened person, observe a pure precept, cultivate the good roots of religious practice, or cultivate a modicum of the good roots of unsurpassed knowledge in this or any other life, since beginningless time I've been in transmigration through birth and death, I would collect them all together and calculate them.

source_sentence: 如三世一切諸佛於最勝無上迴向願中，願皆迴向無上正等菩提。
translation: As all the buddhas of the three times have vowed in the most excellent unsurpassed dedication, they all vow to dedicate themselves to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「一切罪懺悔，　　諸福皆隨喜，　及勸請諸佛，　　願證無上智，　過去及未來，　　現在人中尊，　無量功德海，　　我今稽首禮。」
translation: "To repent of all sins, to rejoice in all merits, and to encourage the buddhas to realize unsurpassed knowledge, I bow my head in homage to the honored among men of the past and future, the boundless ocean of merit."

source_sentence: (右此三十五佛名并懺悔法，出《烏波離所問經》，能淨業障重罪，現生所求禪定解脫，及諸地位皆能滿足。
translation: (Right. These thirty-five names of the buddhas and the repentance method from the Upāliśāstra sūtra purify the heavy sins of karmic hindrances and fulfill the meditative liberation and status sought in this life.

source_sentence: 五天竺國修行大乘人，常於六時禮懺不闕，功德廣多文煩不能盡錄，但依天竺所行者略記之，餘如本經所述也)佛說三十五佛名禮懺文
translation: Those who practice the great vehicle in the five Indian countries always worship and confess at six times without fail. (The merits are too vast and numerous to be recorded in detail, so I'll just briefly record them based on what's practiced in India, and the rest are as described in this sūtra.) The Buddha teaches the thirty-five names of the buddhas in prostration and confession.
